name: The Grandmaster
summary:
This is another humble Beat-Fu game which has a lot of playability, and loads of fun. Follow the journey of the Grand Master, and experience the silly, frustrating and action-packed adventures all in a simple button-tapping game.
In this game, you must beat the ninjas who want you to pay for your bill. But you're a Grand Master, and you don't follow those rules. One button is all it takes to beat these pesky ninjas, and the goal is to do this every single day.
